caption: The image is an advertisement for a job opening as an area manager. The advertisement is posted on Instagram and features a man in a yellow shirt sitting on a yellow scooter. The man is wearing a face mask, indicating the importance of safety and hygiene in the workplace. The advertisement encourages interested applicants to apply now by sending their resumes to the provided website, [www.reallygreatsite.com](http://www.reallygreatsite.com).
original_title: Hiring Online Delivery Service Instagram Post
